Text: Hi Jonathan Here is the address to send the cheque RBC Dominion Securities Dolphin Avenue Kelowna BC VY S Just so you know our firm charges a administrationtrustee fee for Registered accounts each year as do all full service brokerage firms NesbittWood Gundy etc It is for the work involved in reporting the accounts to Revenue Canada For accounts holding only bonds mutual funds and trust units the fee is dollars plus taxes For accounts such as yours holding the above plus stock positions the fee is dollars plus taxes each year We can rebalance your account to take positions in only mutual funds and trust units but you are not allowed to add any money to the account to buy new positions Only Credit Unions and Banks provide fee free RSP accounts and those usually do not include stock positions I guess it is your decision on how you would like to proceed with this account If you want to check other firms to see if they would hold the RSP account for no fee you can certainly do that but if you decide to stay with RBC Dominion Securities they will charge you each year Sorry for the bad news Of course if your account goes up even per year you would have a gain of dollars and a dollar fee would be a small part of that gain We could sell dollars worth of something in the account to generate cash for the fees for years if you would like That would get you some time to see if you remain in the US Let me know how you would like to proceed Dale Onrait BSP MBA RBC InvestmentsKelowna or

PST Hi Jonathan A couple of questions for you Have you proceeded with opening an account at Dane Rauscher yet Your RSP account has a small debit of probably due to RSP holding fees charged to the account for We either need a cheque from you for the or we need to sell worth of something to generate the in the account Just drop me a note or call regarding how you would like to proceed Thanks Dale Onrait BSP MBA RBC InvestmentsKelowna or

PST Hi Jonathan I have gotten a contact for you with our associate firm in Houston The fellows name is Stephen Brown phone at Dain Rauscher He will be expecting your calln Let me know how you make out after you contact him Dale Onrait BSP MBA RBC InvestmentsKelowna or

FWPST Original Message From Onrait Dale Sent Thursday October PM To Subject Hi Johnathan It was great to speak with you the other day I have a request to our transfer department to see if we can transfer your cash account to an affiliate in the US I will let you know as soon as I hear from them Dale Onrait BSP MBA RBC InvestmentsKelowna or
